senses.sense_definition: The quality or state of being triple or threefold.

examples.text: The philosopher explored the <w>triplicity</w> of human existence: mind, body, and spirit.
There is a certain <w>triplicity</w> in the design of the building, with three distinct towers.

senses.sense_definition: A group of three zodiac signs associated with the same element in astrology.

examples.text: Aries, Leo, and Sagittarius make up the fire <w>triplicity</w>.
Astrologers often look at how planets interact within a specific <w>triplicity</w>.
